mapper.select: SELECT id,room_id,room_info_id FROM tb_room_info WHERE status = 1

SELECT room_date.ri_id FROM tb_room_date AS room_date JOIN tb_room_info AS room_info ON room_info.id = room_date.ri_id AND room_info.room_id = #{roomId} AND room_info.status = 1 WHERE room_date.date BETWEEN #{checkInDate} AND #{checkOutDate} AND room_date.status = 0 GROUP BY room_date.ri_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT room_date.date) = DATEDIFF(#{checkOutDate},#{checkInDate}) + 1

SElECT COUNT(DISTINCT room_info.id) FROM tb_room_info AS room_info WHERE room_info.room_id = #{roomId} AND room_info.status = 1 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM tb_room_date AS room_date WHERE room_date.ri_id = room_info.id AND room_date.date BETWEEN #{checkInDate} AND #{checkOutDate} AND room_date.status = 1 )
